alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 8:36PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Teton County through 915 PM MDT... At 835 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Moran Bay, or 15 miles southwest of South Entrance, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Moran Bay around 850 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Colter Bay Village and Moran Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rain is also occurring with this storm. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
